This property verifies the assignment logic for signal maxy1 when certain conditions are met. The verification occurs on every positive edge of the clock signal clk, unless the active-high reset signal rst is asserted.

The property triggers when both DAC equals 1 and signal y is greater than the lower y_bit bits of signal d. When this condition holds, the property requires that signal maxy1 must equal signal y on the same clock cycle.

The assertion checks that whenever DAC is 1 and y exceeds the specified portion of d, the value of maxy1 is immediately updated to match y's value.
